People say this is bad for a reason. Broken AI, the blasted pit alien can't even kill you, nor the security guards. Snarks are hard to kill and disappear randomly. The water seems so out of place and is compared to sliding on ice. Don't get it unless you need it for a Gmod texture.

I recommend Half-Life: Source, but only if you are planning to use it for GMod. If you want to actually play Half-Life, don't bother with this game and go for the original instead. This game is very buggy and (in my opinion) not as fun as the original game.

A complete stain on the original game, this game is a poorly ported mess of the original to source there are glitches everywhere. Do not buy this game it is a bad excuse for a remaster, play Black Mesa if you want a good remaster of the original.

half life source

Don't play this over Half-Life because it's ridden with bugs and glitches and graphically, the only difference between this game and the original is that this game has Source engine physics, lighting and water. If you went into this game expecting it to be a remake of Half-Life, it's not. It's more or less a port of Half-Life to Source. If you want to play a remake of Half-Life, then play Black Mesa instead.

its petty goo
Even If People Hate This Game I Like It And Its A Weird Masterpiece And Do I Reccomend This... Kinda

I see a lot of people give this half life hate, and I don't know why. It is my favourite HL game because of the simple feature Source allows: Ragdolls. The original Half Life was a amazing game with a amazing atmosphere and groundbreaking storytelling, Black Mesa has improved graphics and added improvements to Xen and the over arching story, while Source gives you a semi-shitfucked mess most of the time that is so much fun to play around in. I'll add I used this game as a substitute for G-mod since I'm a cheap bastard and have been since I was a kid, so 90% of my time in this game is spawning in enemies to fight and messing with the gravity. Source gave me a limited sandbox to play in, and I used that to it's full ability to have lots of fun both with the original HL story, and just fucking around and blowing shit up. 

TLDR: It's fun

super spiel

Really bad. Can't finish the game at all, the crowbar hits everything with a metallic sound; save games get deleted; the HD models reflect like a flashbang in CS:GO, just horrible. NPCs bug out very frequently, chapters load in with a grey wall in front of you which essentially soft- locks you.
Applying HD textures on weapons does not qualify it to be a remaster. Nothing ever changed from the original except the bugs, of which there are so many, I lost track.
The only good thing that came out of this was the Black Mesa remake, which is truly phenomenal.
2/10- GO PLAY THE ORIGINAL,and the Black Mesa Remake.

EDIT: Completed the game. Still shit.
